alert.note: Alert for Baker; Ben Hill; Berrien; Brooks; Colquitt; Cook; Decatur; Dougherty; Early; Grady; Irwin; Lanier; Lee; Lowndes; Miller; Mitchell; Seminole; Thomas; Tift; Turner; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued August 08 at 5:42PM EDT until August 08 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 613 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 9 PM EDT /8 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ALABAMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHEAST ALABAMA HOUSTON IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN PANHANDLE FLORIDA HOLMES JACKSON WALTON WASHINGTON IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 21 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BEN HILL BERRIEN BROOKS COLQUITT COOK IRWIN LANIER LOWNDES THOMAS TIFT TURNER WORTH IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA BAKER DECATUR DOUGHERTY EARLY GRADY LEE MILLER MITCHELL SEMINOLE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBA, ADEL, ALBANY, ALFORDS, ALPINE HEIGHTS, ARGYLE, ASHBURN, ASHTON, AUSMAC, BABCOCK, BAINBRIDGE, BANNOCKBURN, BARKER STORE, BARNEYVILLE, BEACHTON, BELLVIEW, BERRIEN CO A/P, BLAKELY, BLUE SPRINGS, BONIFAY, BOWENS MILL, BOYKIN, BRANCHVILLE, BROOKS CO A/P, BROWNTOWN, CAIRO, CAMILLA, CAPEL, CENTER RIDGE, CENTERVILLE, CHIPLEY, CHIPLEY MUNICIPAL AIRPORT, CHULA, CLUSTER SPRINGS, COBB CROSSROADS, COLQUITT, COOK CO A/P, COOKTOWN, COTTLE, COTTON, COTTONWOOD, COURTHOUSE, CRYSTAL LAKE, CUBA, DAVIS PARK, DE FUNIAK SPRING AIRPORT, DE FUNIAK SPRINGS, DECATUR CO A/P, DILLON, DIXIE, DONALDSONVILLE A/P, DONALSONVILLE, DOTHAN, DOUGLASVILLE, EARLY CO A/P, EAST ALBANY, ELMODEL WMA, ELPINO, EMPRESS, ENTERPRISE, EUCHEEANNA, FAIRCHILD, FITZGERALD, FITZGERALD MUNICIPAL A/P, FIVE POINTS, FORRESTER, GAMMAGE, GORDY, GRACEVILLE, GRADY CO A/P, GREGGS, GROOVERVILLE, HANOVER, HARDING, HAWKINSTOWN, HOBBY, HOGGARD MILL, HOLMES COUNTY AIRPORT, IRWINVILLE, ISABELLA, IVEYS MILL, LACONTE, LAKELAND, LEESBURG, LEONIA, LITTLE HOPE, LOCKETT CROSSING, LYNN, MALONE, MARIANNA, MASSEE, MAYHAW, METCALF, MILFORD, MITCHELL CO A/P, MONCRIEF, MOULTRIE, MOULTRIE MUNICIPAL A/P, NANKIN, NASHVILLE, NEW HOPE, NEWTON, OCILLA, ORANGE HILL, PALMYRA, PASCO, PELHAM, PINE PARK, PINE VALLEY, POPLAR HEAD, PRETORIA, QUEENSLAND, QUITMAN, RED ROCK, RED STORE CROSSROADS, RICHTER CROSSROADS, RIVERTURN, SEMINOLE STATE PARK, SIMSVILLE, SMITHVILLE, SNEADS, SOUTHWEST GA REGIONAL A/P, SPENCE AIRPORT, STEINHAM STORE, SUNSWEET, SYLVESTER, SYLVESTER AIRPORT, TEETERVILLE, THOMASVILLE, TIFTON, TURNER CITY, VALDOSTA, VALDOSTA REGIONAL AIRPORT, WALKER, WATERLOO, WEBER, WEST BAINBRIDGE, WESTWOOD, AND WORTH.
